content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'jobsdata_strdiasbxdpsdl_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [jobsdata_strdiasbxdpsdl_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://jobsdata@strdiasbxdpsdl.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [FactJobs] (
	[JNCOUNTER] nvarchar(4000),
	[AGENCYNAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[AGENCYNUMBER] nvarchar(4000),
	[JOBREFERENCE] nvarchar(4000),
	[JOBTYPE] nvarchar(4000),
	[POSITION] nvarchar(4000),
	[LOCATION] nvarchar(4000),
	[STARTDATE] nvarchar(4000),
	[DURATION] nvarchar(4000),
	[RATE] nvarchar(4000),
	[CONTACT] nvarchar(4000),
	[DATEINPUT] nvarchar(4000),
	[OTHER] nvarchar(4000),
	[ORIGINALDATE] nvarchar(4000),
	[INDUSTRY] nvarchar(4000),
	[Category] nvarchar(4000),
	[ARCHIVEDDATE] nvarchar(4000),
	[DELETEDDATE] nvarchar(4000),
	[__index_level_0__] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Jobs_newdata/jobs.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [jobsdata_strdiasbxdpsdl_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[FactJobs]
GO
